name: Ship Control (ManFart)
description:
A quick game I whipped up in about a week, It's my first actual working project so be gentle. It's a 2 player top down shooter. No AI so the only way to actually play it right now is with 2 people. Again this is my first project so any constructive criticism would be helpful. Even if it's not so constructive.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Player 1 :

 move WASD fire C

Player 2:

move IJKL fire n

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
